channel.title: KLS:LMC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in KLS:LMC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Malayan Cement Sees Rising Malaysia Urbanization Fueling Growth
item.description: Malayan Cement Bhd. expects future infrastructure projects driven in part by Malaysia’s rapidly growing urban population to act as a long-term growth catalyst.
